scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path scss scss/index.scss css/index.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/tienda.scss css/tienda.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/servicios.scss css/servicios.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/about.scss css/about.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/contacto.scss css/contacto.css
